thread.title: Woman, 50, found stabbed to death inside her Queens home
thread.title_full: Woman, 50, found stabbed to death inside her Queens home

author: ROCCO PARASCANDOLA
title: Woman, 50, found stabbed to death inside her Queens home
text:
Woman, 50, found stabbed to death inside her Queens home Woman, 50, found stabbed to death inside her Queens home The woman was found stabbed to death just before noon on March 16, 2017. (Google)   4:44 PM 
A 50-year-old woman was found stabbed to death inside her Queens home Thursday, police said. 
The victim, whose name was not immediately released, was discovered dead just past 11 a.m. inside her family’s home on 174th St. near 137th Ave. in Rochdale, cops said. 
She had severe stab and slash wounds on her head, torso and arms. 
Detectives were interviewing the woman’s husband and other relatives to try to determine who killed her and why. Tags:
